title: Are You Active?
content:
I think it would be interesting to see just who is still visiting this place. There are certainly a lot less people posting at the moment, but I'm among them, and still addicted to Keen, so that is not necessarily an indication that the community is drying up.

So, give us a wave if you're reading this. Just a simple, "Hi, I'm alive!" will suffice.

Keen on!

title: Re: Are You Active?
content:
I am very attract... oh wait, I misread while I clicked open this thread.
I'm not really active, but I come here every now and again.
I also go away for a few months every now and again after I get bored and I feel visiting takes too much time I could be using for other things I like.
Nobody misses me, and after a while I come back again.

Like what was mentioned in the thread where LL says she left, pretty much everything Keen-related has been said already.
(Well, we could use an interview with Tom Hall for instance for some more unknown background information about the series of course.)
That in turn means I don't really have anything to say, and posting nonsense is only fun for so long.
I do still intend to post about some Keen-related things I plan on working on, I still have a mod I need to finish (computer problems, so I can't at the moment), but it seems I'm not really in a hurry.
So... I guess it depends on your definition of "active"... I do still visit here.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: here
content: I check this forum at least once a day. I may not be as productive as I once was, but I'm not going to give up on Keen, or his community. I'd still love to meet each and every one of you. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]
